alert.note: Alert for Anderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:49PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR EASTERN SPENCER...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...NORTHEASTERN NELSON... NORTHWESTERN MERCER...ANDERSON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Lawrenceburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Ballard, Bloomfield, Oregon, Wakefield, Wayside, Bondville, Dugansville, Talmage and Anderson City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
